short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Super fast, super easy, one-click, hosted bug tracker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Caravela is a simple and powerful bug and issue tracking system designed from the ground up to be fast and to stay out of your way. Almost everything is optional making Caravela one of the lightest and easiest to use bug trackers around. You can create a bug tracker in a single click (no kidding), take it for a test run, and be up and running with your whole team in just a few minutes.

And yet, Caravela is powerful, too! Check out these features:

- One-click hosted bug tracker
- Fast, painless bug handling
- Customize with your logo and URL
- Public and private bug trackers
- Tags, comments, attachments
- Full-text search
- Burn down charts
- Unlimited bugs and users
- Email notifications
- XML import/export
- OpenID support
